#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    char a[5];
    int p,n,i;
    while(1)
    {
             scanf("%s",a);
             if(strcmp(a,"#")==0)
             break;
     
        
              p=0;n=0;
              for(i=0;i<strlen(a);i++)
              {
              n=(10)*n+(a[i]-'0');
              p++;
              }
              
                    if(n<=10)
                  {
                        switch(n)
                            {
             case 1:cout<<1<<endl;
             break;
             case 2:cout<<5<<endl;
             break;
             case 3:cout<<4<<endl;
             break;
             case 4:cout<<0<<endl;
             break;
             case 5:cout<<5<<endl;
             break;
             case 6:cout<<1<<endl;
             break;
             case 7:cout<<2<<endl;
             break;
             case 8:cout<<8<<endl;
             break;
             case 9:cout<<9<<endl;
             break;
             case 10:cout<<9<<endl;
                            }
                  }//end of first if
    else
    {
            p=n%10;
            
        switch(p)
        {
                    case 0:cout<<(9+(n/10-1)*3)%10<<endl;
                    break;
                    case 1:cout<<(9+(n/10-1)*3+1)%10<<endl;
                    break;
                    case 2:cout<<(9+(n/10-1)*3+7)%10<<endl;
                    break;
                    case 3:cout<<(9+(int(n/10-1)*3)+8)%10<<endl;
                    break;
                    case 4:cout<<(9+(n/10-1)*3+4)%10<<endl;
                    break;
                    case 5:cout<<(9+(n/10-1)*3+9)%10<<endl;
                    break;
                    case 6:cout<<(9+(n/10-1)*3+5)%10<<endl;
                    break;
                    case 7:cout<<(9+(n/10-1)*3+6)%10<<endl;
                    break;
                    case 8:cout<<(9+(n/10-1)*3+2)%10<<endl;
                    break;
                    case 9:cout<<(9+(n/10-1)*3+3)%10<<endl;
                    break;
        }
    }//end of else
                    
}


return 0;
}
